item.title: Reading and Resources for Prison Banned Books Week: Book Censorship News, October 17, 2025
item.description: Next week is Prison Banned Books Week. Here are some readings and resources in preparation.

item.title: Why Is the One Piece Flag Showing Up at Protests?
item.description: Protests are springing up across Asia in response to inequality. One thing they have in common? They're flying One Piece's Straw Hat flag.

item.title: 3 of My Favorite Backlist Books About Food
item.description: I remembered first holding these books in my hands, poring over their pages, and marveling at their stories.

item.title: The Most Read Books on Goodreads This Week
item.description: Here are the five most-read books on Goodreads this week! These are the buzziest books of the moment, from thrillers to paranormal romance.

item.title: A Twisty Thriller Sequel as Unputdownable as the First
item.description: This twisty sequel to a wildly popular thriller is unputdownable and well worth the wait.
